Package Reservation_package

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • Reservation_package.Table
  • public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
    Table class that contains table information such as table number, max seating capacity of the table, timeslots, and customers reserving this table at each timeslot

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Table​(int id, int size)
      Table object constructor

      Gets Customer who reserved this table at specific timeslot

      Gets list of reservations for this Table

      Gets max size of this Table
      java.time.LocalDateTime[] getTimeslots()
      Gets list of timeslots for this Table
      boolean isReservedAtTime​(int time)
      Gets boolean of whether this table is reserved at specified timeslot
      void printReservations​(java.lang.String[] timeslot)
      Prints reservations made for this table for all timeslots, prints Customer name if reserved and nothing if not
      void removeReservationAtTime​(int time)
      Removes reservation at specified timeslot
      void reserveAtTime​(Customer customer, int time)

        Gets Customer who reserved this table at specific timeslot
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Customer object assigned to specified timeslot

      • isReservedAtTime

        public boolean isReservedAtTime​(int time)
        Gets boolean of whether this table is reserved at specified timeslot
        Parameters:
        time - int index of the timeslot
        Returns:
        boolean true if reserved, false if not

      • reserveAtTime

        public void reserveAtTime​(Customer customer,
                          int time)
        Reserves this Table by assigning Customer object to it at specified time
        Parameters:
        customer - Customer to be assigned to this table
        time - int index of timeslot the customer is reserving

      • removeReservationAtTime

        public void removeReservationAtTime​(int time)
        Removes reservation at specified timeslot
        Parameters:
        time - int index of timeslot to be cleared

      • printReservations

        public void printReservations​(java.lang.String[] timeslot)
        Prints reservations made for this table for all timeslots, prints Customer name if reserved and nothing if not
        Parameters:
        timeslot - Array of timeslots to be iterated through to print reservation status
